name: Fat Pig
description:
Fat Pig tells the story of a scary time in a young pig's life when he was abducted by evil creatures as they attempted to turn him into sausages.

Play in full screen for best graphical result.

Controls:

WASD to move
Space to jump
E to oink
F to dash

This project was made whilst on the NFTS Games Design and Development Course for a module where we had to design a game suitable for a mobile device.
